alerts.description: Completion notification for Non-Standard Pricing request
ELI Opportunity has been set to status of Research
EMAIL ALERT FOR REFERRAL TO SE
Email Alert For Order has been set to "Completed to Billing"
Email Alert For Order has been set to "Order to Pending"
Email Notification to Account Consultant when New Opp is created
Email Notification to Account Owner when New Opp is created that is not owned by account owner or indirect
Notification sent when order status is "Sales Working" for more than 24 hours
OM Rep has taken ownership of Non Standard pricing request
Opportunity Close Date is Past Due
Opportunity-Order Status-Return to Sales-Send email to Opportunity Owner
Response from AE to Request for Information
SE Notification on Closed Won Opportunity
Stand Alone Non Stardard Product Notification

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND( PRIORVALUE( Current_Stage_Name__c ) = "Stage 1 - Working / Pipeline", TEXT(Stage1_Stop__c) = ""), TODAY(), Stage1_Stop__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage1 Stop

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND( PRIORVALUE( Current_Stage_Name__c ) = "Stage 2 - Best Case / Upside", TEXT(Stage2_Stop__c) = ""), TODAY(), Stage2_Stop__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage2 Stop

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND( PRIORVALUE( Current_Stage_Name__c ) = "Stage 3 - Commit", TEXT(Stage3_Stop__c) = ""), TODAY(), Stage3_Stop__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage3 Stop

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND( PRIORVALUE( Current_Stage_Name__c ) = "Stage 4 - Contract Signed / Won", TEXT(Stage4_Stop__c) = ""), TODAY(), Stage4_Stop__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage4 Stop

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( TEXT(StageName ) = "Stage 1 - Working / Pipeline", "Stage 1 - Working / Pipeline", Stage1_Name__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage 1 Name

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( TEXT(StageName ) = "Stage 2 - Best Case / Upside", "Stage 2 - Best Case / Upside", Stage2_Name__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage 2 Name

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND( TEXT(StageName ) = "Stage 2 - Best Case / Upside", TEXT(Stage2_Start__c) = ""), TODAY(), Stage2_Start__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage 2 Start

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND( TEXT(StageName ) = "Stage 3 - Commit", TEXT(Stage3_Start__c) = ""), TODAY(), Stage3_Start__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage 3 Start

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( TEXT(StageName ) = "Stage 4 - Contract Signed / Won", "Stage 4 - Contract Signed / Won", Stage4_Name__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage 4 Name

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND( TEXT(StageName ) = "Stage 4 - Contract Signed / Won", TEXT(Stage4_Start__c) = ""), TODAY(), Stage4_Start__c )
fieldUpdates.name: CSP Stage 4 Start

fieldUpdates.description: When OM Rep takes ownership of a NSP request, the NSP Request Working Date is timestamped.
fieldUpdates.name: NSP Request Working Date

fieldUpdates.description: Updates NSP Completed Date field when stage is changed to Non-Standard Offer Completed
fieldUpdates.name: Non-Standard Offer Completed Date

fieldUpdates.description: TIme Stamps the NSP Submitted Date field when stage is changed to Non Standard Offer Request
fieldUpdates.name: Opportunity - NSP Submitted Date

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Status field to Sales Working
fieldUpdates.name: Order Status Set to Sales Working
Set Close Date 60 Days From Created Date

fieldUpdates.description: Changes Opp. stage to Non-Standard Offer Request
fieldUpdates.name: Stage = Non-Standard Offer Request

fieldUpdates.formula: TRIM(IF(Proposal_Letter__c != null, 'ProposalLetter ', '') + ',' + IF(Business_Objectives__c != null && Proposed_Solutions__c != null, 'ExecutiveSummary ', '') + ' ')
fieldUpdates.name: Update PDF Flags field

rules.description: Fires only on record create to clear values.
Fires a when Closed Date changes but not on the same day as record creation date.]
Fires a when either Amount, CPE Amount or Current MRR values change but not on the same day as record creation date.
rules.formula: AND( OR( PRIORVALUE(CPE_Amount__c) <>CPE_Amount__c, PRIORVALUE(Amount)<> Amount, PRIORVALUE(Current_MRR_del__c) <> Current_MRR_del__c ), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <> DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate) )

rules.description: When an Opp. is created, copy the Service Address from the Account to the Services Address fields under the Non-Standard Pricing section.
Store the StageName value in the custom field called Current Stage Name. This custom field is necessary for Custom Report Types.

rules.fullName: E-Rate Opportunity Created - Notify Opportunity Owner
rules.description: Send Email to AccountOwner when a new opportunity is created on Account
Email is sent to the sale engineer when the status is referred to se

rules.fullName: Month to Month Renewal Follow Up
rules.description: Create a task to Opportunity Owner to follow up on Closed Lost Opportunity with Lost Reason of Customer Decision - Month to Month

rules.booleanFilter: 12 AND 11 AND (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10)
rules.description: Notification to rep and manager when a discontinued product is ordered for a new logo

rules.fullName: Offer Management Rep has taken ownership of request
rules.description: When the OM Rep field is filled in, the Opp. owner is notified that the request is being worked on.
Notify Sales Ops of Order to Pending for revenue audit

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Contract Term End Date - Follow Up Regarding Contract
rules.description: When Contract Term End Date is entered and greater than 90 days in the future create a follow up task (60 days from today) for AE to call contact.
Sets off a series of events when the Completed by OM checkbox is checked.
Sets off a series of actions when the stage is changed to Non-Standard Offer Request
Notify GES of Bid being checked on Opportunity

8/1/16 Cristie Rozell: Deactivating per Betsy Nagy. Betsy and Jodi decided this is NOT something they want to do automatically due to impacts on reports/dashboards and forecasting tab all driving off of close date.
Send Email to Account Consultant when a new opportunity is created on Account
Send Email to AE when a new Opportunity is created that does not belong to account owner or indirect

rules.fullName: Opportunity Initial Appointment Held Date set
Opportunity Order has been set to %22Completed to Billing%22
rules.description: When Opportunity Order Status changed to 'Completed to Billing', send email notification to Opportunity Owner and related Care Org contacts.

rules.fullName: Opportunity Order has been set to %22Order to Pending%22
rules.description: When Opportunity Order Status changed to 'Order to Pending", send email notification to Opportunity Owner and related Care Org contacts.
This will trigger a field update to set the Opportunity Owner Manmger's Email.

rules.fullName: Opportunity is still in Sales Working
rules.formula: AND(Owner.Alias <> 'gmalo',Owner.Alias <> 'ljohn', Owner.Alias <> 'csull', Owner.Alias <> 'lhill', Owner.Profile.Name <> 'Indirect Sales', Owner.Profile.Name <> 'Custom Partner Community', OR( TEXT (StageName) = 'Stage 4 - Contract Signed / Won', TEXT (StageName) = 'Stage 5 - Accepted / Order Pending' ),TEXT ( Order__r.Status__c ) = 'Sales Working', RecordType.DeveloperName<>'ILEC_Manual_Entry')

rules.fullName: Opportunity-Order Status-Notify AE of missing data
rules.description: When the Order Status field is set to "Returned to Sales" then send the owner of the Opportunity an email.

rules.fullName: Order Status set to Sales Working when Closed Won
rules.description: Set the Order Status field to Sales Working when opportunity is Closed Won.
Create a proposal task when stage on Opp is Proposed or Greater
Increment the Push Counter field by 1
rules.formula: IF( CloseDate > PRIORVALUE( CloseDate ), IF (MONTH(CloseDate) <> MONTH(PRIORVALUE( CloseDate )) , TRUE, FALSE), FALSE)

rules.fullName: Request for more information from OM to AE is complete
rules.description: When the Request for more information from OM to AE is complete, clear the fields

rules.fullName: SE Email Alert on Closed Won Opportunities
rules.description: Send email to the Sales Engineer and Account Consultant on the opportunity based on Closed Won Opportunity

rules.fullName: Set Close Date 60 Days From Created Date
rules.description: When opportunity has been created from a lead, set opportunity close date 60 days from opportunity created date.
Notify specific individuals once an order hits Commit or Upside and is over $4K.
Reminder to follow up on waiting Opportunity as Close Date approaches.
When the iCert status is changed send an email to the opportunity owner.

tasks.description: You have been assigned as a Sales Engineer - please complete Research activities and then close this task.
tasks.subject: ELI Opportunity has been set to status of Research

tasks.description: You have set a Renewal Opportunity to the stage of "Waiting" pending the term end date. Follow up on the Opportunity 30 days prior to the term end/Opportunity Close Date.
tasks.subject: Follow Up on Waiting Opportunity

tasks.description: This Renewal Opportunity was Closed Lost as a result of a customer decision to continue with Integra on a Month to Month basis. Please follow up with the customer 45 days after last contact to see if their situation has changed.
tasks.subject: Month to Month Decision Follow Up

tasks.description: Please respond to the Information/Change request. Details can be found in the Non-Standard Pricing Section of the Opportunity
tasks.subject: Offer Management Changes Requested

tasks.description: Please follow up with Contact regarding contract term date.
tasks.subject: Please follow up with Contact regarding contract.

tasks.description: Please review Total MRR - verify against ICC orders to confirm correctly reporting revenue.
tasks.subject: Revenue Audit
